description: The white-flowered asphodel (Asphodelus albus) is an amazing plant species for its intense beauty, as it boasts subtle creamy white and even yellow hues, in soft petals that make a mesmerizing display. The furry, silvery foliage provides further captivating details at the base of the flowers, creating an eye-catching contrast. Extremely resilient, white-flowered asphodel favours dry climates and rocky soils, making it a great choice for wild gardeners. Its uncommon but gorgeous features make it an ideal addition to any garden.
